comment: Derive the Axiom of Power Sets from the Tarski-Grothendieck axiom ~ ax-groth . Note that ~ ax-pow is not used by the proof. Use ~ axpweq to obtain ~ ax-pow . Use ~ pwex or ~ pwexg instead. (Contributed by Gérard Lang, 22-Jun-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)
